Question
========
Which of the following is a test that can be used to assess multivariate
differences in MANOVA?

Answerlist
----------
* Roy's largest root
* Wilks's lambda
* All other answers are correct
* Hotelling's T<sup>2</sup>

Solution
========





Hotelings' T<sup>2</sup>, Roy's largest root and Wilk's Lamda are all
tests for multivariate differences in MANOVA. Therefore, the option 'All
the other answers are correct' is the correct one.




Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
